text: Charlotte ("Lotte") Hildegard Hass (née Baierl; 6 November 1928 – 14 January 2015) was the second wife of the Austrian naturalist and diving pioneer Hans Hass (who died on 16 June 2013). She worked as an underwater model and actress in several of his underwater natural history movies. She was added into the Women Divers Hall of Fame and the International Scuba Diving Hall of Fame in 2000.Member Roster at the Women Divers Hall of Fame ==References== == Other websites == Lotte Hass at IMDb Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Austrian movie actors Category:Austrian models Category:Actors from Vienna
title: Lotte Hass
